translation.en: Everyone, be careful. We're almost there.
Lord, when I said, "Cross my heart and hope to die young and pretty,"
translation.es: Señor, cuando recé para morir joven y bonito,

translation.en: I did not mean today!
Ray Ray, stop being so dramatic.
I'm not going to stop being me right before I die!
No one is going to die-- [screams]
Amber, don't fall. I got us a Groupon for a couple's massage.
translation.es: ¡Amber, no te caigas! ¡Tengo un cupón para masajes de pareja!

translation.en: I'd rather plummet to my death.
[screams] I'm slipping! Hold on!
[Amber grunts] Kaylie!
[paparazzi shouting] Kaylie!
Order!
Ooh, I'd love a sparkling water with a slice of cucumber. Thank you!
translation.es: Quiero un agua con gas con una rodaja de pepino. ¡Gracias!

translation.en: The defendant,
Kaylee Konrad,
gunned her Mercedes through a Dolce & Gabbana display window,
translation.es: atravesó con su Mercedes una vitrina de Dolce & Gabbana,

translation.en: committing aggravated assault on a bunch of really surprised mannequins.
translation.es: y cometió agresión agravada contra unos maniquíes muy sorprendidos.

translation.en: It was an accident.
Sorry, guys.
Besides, mock turtlenecks, that's the real crime.
translation.es: Además, ¿cuellos de tortuga? Ese es el verdadero delito.

translation.en: -[gavel banging] -Order! And I said no cameras.
translation.es: ¡Orden! Y dije que no quería cámaras.

translation.en: Just be quiet and look pretty.
translation.es: Solo cállate y luce bonita. Por cierto, tus labios se ven delgados.

translation.en: BTW, your lips look thin. I told you to plump.
translation.es: Solo cállate y luce bonita. Por cierto, tus labios se ven delgados. ¡Te dije que los rellenaras!

translation.en: Miss Konrad, do you have anything you'd like to say?
Yes, Your Honor. [clears throat]
I believe our justice system needs to stop persecuting innocent celebrities
translation.es: El sistema judicial debería dejar de perseguir a celebridades inocentes

translation.en: and start paying more attention to what's happening in our communities.
translation.es: y prestar más atención a lo que sucede en nuestras comunidades.

translation.en: I rest my briefcase.
-[gavel bangs] -[Judge] Order.
You're not innocent, and I should send you to jail.
translation.es: No es inocente. Y debería enviarla a prisión.

translation.en: No! She could never handle that.
I could so.
Please! You once had to ride in the back of a non-stretch limo,
translation.es: Por favor. Una vez viajaste en la parte trasera de una limusina básica

translation.en: and you broke out in hives.
It had faux leather seats! I'm lucky to be alive.
translation.es: ¡No eran asientos de cuero! Tengo suerte de estar viva.

translation.en: Although, ratings could go through the roof.
translation.es: Aunque el índice de audiencia podría aumentar.

translation.en: [gasps] We could make a fortune on the Kaylie Dream Cell.
translation.es: Podríamos ganar mucho con la celda de ensueño de Kaylie.

translation.en: Shiv sold separately.
translation.es: El arma se vende por separado.

translation.en: I'd buy that.
-[gavel bangs] -[Judge] Order!
Miss Konrad, since you mentioned community,
translation.es: Señorita Konrad, ya que mencionó a la comunidad,

translation.en: I hereby sentence you to one year of community service.
translation.es: la sentencio a un año de servicio comunitario.

translation.en: That is so sweet!
The community's gonna work for me for a whole year?
translation.es: ¿La comunidad trabajará para mí todo un año?

translation.en: ♪ Team Kaylie, ay, ay Team Kaylie ♪
♪ Where's a map? 'Cuz I could use directions ♪
♪ To get from Hollywood to firewood ♪
translation.es: Para ir de Hollywood a otra aventura

translation.en: ♪ Even though I don't know Where I'm headin' ♪
♪ I'm making friends and looking good ♪
translation.es: Pero hago amigos y me veo bien

translation.en: ♪ We may not belong But who cares? Bring it on ♪
translation.es: No pertenecemos, Pero no importa, igual lo intentamos

translation.en: ♪ 'Cuz I know we're gonna find our way ♪
translation.es: Porque sé que encontraremos Nuestro camino

translation.en: ♪ Team Kaylie ♪
translation.es: Equipo Kaylie Cuando la vida parezca una locura

translation.en: ♪ When your life gets wild Follow me through the wilderness ♪
translation.es: Equipo Kaylie Cuando la vida parezca una locura Sígueme hacia la aventura

translation.en: ♪ Team Kaylie ♪
translation.es: Equipo Kaylie Lo hacemos con soltura

translation.en: ♪ Roughing it in style Together, yeah, we'll be killin' it ♪
translation.es: Equipo Kaylie Lo hacemos con soltura Juntos nos superaremos

translation.en: ♪ Team Kaylie, ay, ay Team Kaylie ♪
-Okay, how does that look? -Perfect.
translation.es: GRUPO DE AVENTURA PICO ¡VAMOS, PUERCOESPINES! - ¿Cómo se ve? - Perfecto.

translation.en: Perfect would be you and me in the cafeteria
translation.es: Perfecto seríamos tú y yo en la cafetería,

translation.en: Lady and the Tramp-ing a strand of spaghetti.
translation.es: como La Dama y el Vagabundo con el plato de pasta.

translation.en: I've got an in with the lunch lady.
And I still have a thumb tack.
translation.es: Y yo aún tengo una chincheta.

translation.en: So... rain check?
[Chewy] Ow!
Silence! Valeria, what are you doing back there?
Putting a Santeria curse on Mr. Jabowski.
translation.es: Le echo una maldición de santería al señor Jabowski.

translation.en: [chuckles] That's the last time he gives me detention.
translation.es: Es la última vez que me castiga.

translation.en: This deadly curse will follow Mr. Jabowski and his children's children's children
translation.es: ¡Esta maldición mortal seguirá al señor Jabowski y a su descendencia

translation.en: until the end of time!
translation.es: hasta el fin de los tiempos!

translation.en: And if that doesn't work, these shells are super sharp,
translation.es: Si no funciona, estas chinchetas son muy filosas

translation.en: and I left one on his chair.
translation.es: y le dejé una en la silla.

translation.en: Wow, this turnout is lamer than the Spice Girls reunion tour.
translation.es: Vino menos gente que para la gira de reencuentro de las Spice Girls.

translation.en: Baby Spice pushing 50? That's just sad.
translation.es: ¿Baby Spice llegando a los 50? Qué triste.

translation.en: Ray Ray!
Did you come to your senses and decide to join our Wilderness Club?
translation.es: ¿Recapacitaste y quieres unirte al Grupo de Aventura?

translation.en: Baby girl, we've been over this.
translation.es: Nena, ya lo hablamos. Todo me queda bien, excepto la tierra

translation.en: I look good in everything, except dirt, and culottes.
translation.es: Nena, ya lo hablamos. Todo me queda bien, excepto la tierra y las faldas pantalón. Debo ejercitar las pantorrillas.

translation.en: I have got to work on my calves.
translation.es: y las faldas pantalón. Debo ejercitar las pantorrillas.

translation.en: But the kickoff hike to Sunset Peak is today!
translation.es: ¡Pero la caminata inicial a Cima Sunset es hoy!

translation.en: Ten teams from our school district compete,
and whoever plants their flag at the top first gets a Silver Pine Cone!
translation.es: y quien ice su bandera en la cima obtiene la Piña de Plata!

translation.en: You lost me at hike.
translation.es: Me desanimaste con la caminata. Sabes que somos amigos

translation.en: You know we've been tight since we were in diapers.
translation.es: Me desanimaste con la caminata. Sabes que somos amigos desde que usamos pañales.

translation.en: Mine were stylish. Yours were just... full.
translation.es: Los míos eran elegantes, los tuyos estaban llenos.

translation.en: But when it comes to Mother Nature, Ray Ray is JOMO.
translation.es: Pero en cuanto a la naturaleza, Ray Ray prefiere evitarla.

translation.en: But we need all the help we can get!
I do not want to lose again to those spoiled, snotty Lumberjacks.
translation.es: No quiero volver a perder contra los malcriados Leñadores.

translation.en: May they choke on their filthy money 'til their blood-soaked eyeballs burst
translation.es: ¡Que se ahoguen con su dinero sucio hasta que sus ojos ensangrentados salgan de sus cráneos!

translation.en: from their skulls!
translation.es: hasta que sus ojos ensangrentados salgan de sus cráneos!

translation.en: Which is exactly what happened last year
translation.es: Eso pasó el año pasado cuando la Srta. Gerstonblatt

translation.en: when Miss Gerstonblatt had a stroke on the zipline.
translation.es: Eso pasó el año pasado cuando la Srta. Gerstonblatt tuvo una apoplejía en la tirolesa.

translation.en: And now we don't have an adult to lead our Wilderness Club.
translation.es: No hay un adulto que lidere el Grupo de Aventura.

translation.en: We don't need an adult.
My mom and I used to go camping all the time, so I can lead us to victory.
translation.es: Mi mamá y yo acampábamos siempre. - Puedo llevarnos a la victoria. - Según las reglas, necesitamos un adulto.

translation.en: But the rules say we need an adult.
translation.es: - Puedo llevarnos a la victoria. - Según las reglas, necesitamos un adulto.

translation.en: Screw the rules.
But rules lead to order, and order leads to lists,
translation.es: Pero las reglas llevan al orden, y el orden lleva a las listas,

translation.en: and lists lead to happiness.
translation.es: ¡y las listas llevan a la felicidad!

translation.en: Besides, no one at the school ever wants the job anyway.
translation.es: Además, nadie quiere hacer este trabajo.

translation.en: Especially after Miss Gerstonblatt took that zipline to heaven.
translation.es: Sobre todo tras lo de la señorita Gerstonblatt.

translation.en: And you think some stranger is just going to walk through that door
translation.es: ¿Y creen que un desconocido entrará por la puerta

translation.en: and say, "Let me lead you"?
Let me lead you.
Oh! Hello.
-OMG, that's Kaylie Konrad! -Who cares?
translation.es: - Dios mío. ¡Es Kaylie Konrad! - ¿A quién le importa?

translation.en: Everyone!
See? I'm a do-gooder.
Kaylie Konrad picks up trash!
That was my lunch!
Kaylie Konrad helps homeless children.
translation.es: Kaylie Konrad ayuda a niños indigentes.

translation.en: I'm not homeless.
Oh. Awkward.
I curse you.
Okay, we're done. Remember, I'll be at NOBU tonight.
translation.es: Terminamos. Recuerden, hoy iré a cenar a Nobu.

translation.en: I have to meet Kaylie. What do I do?
translation.es: Tengo que conocer a Kaylie. ¿Qué hago?

translation.en: Just stay cool.
Right. Cool.
I love you, Kaylie Konrad! Can I touch you?
[giggles] I touched her!
You do know what cool means, right?
Excuse me, Miss Konrad, what are you doing at Pico Middle School?
translation.es: Disculpe, señorita Konrad, ¿qué hace en la secundaria Pico?

translation.en: And you should be wearing a visitor's pass.
translation.es: Y debería tener un pase de visitante.

translation.en: I just reprimanded Kaylie Konrad!
Your principal sent me to this room to help you guys out with some club.
translation.es: Su directora me envió para ayudarlos con un grupo.

translation.en: So, where's the VIP area?
Oh, no way!
You come with me.
You're the smallest bouncer I've ever seen.
translation.es: Eres la portera más pequeña que he visto.

translation.en: Principal Dana, I need a different do-gooder thingy.
translation.es: Directora Dana, deme otra acción bondadosa.

translation.en: This tiny bouncer here says that we might have to walk through dirt.
translation.es: Esta porterita dice que quizás debamos caminar por la tierra.

translation.en: Yeah, I do not see myself doing that.
Well, I did not see myself scoping Tinder every night
translation.es: Yo no me veía a mí misma en Tinder todas las noches

translation.en: eating cold ravioli out of a can, but... here we are.
translation.es: comiendo ravioles fríos de una lata, pero aquí estoy.

translation.en: Aw, you're so lucky you can Tinder. I'm way too famous.
translation.es: Es tan afortunada de usar Tinder. Soy demasiado famosa.

translation.en: And TBH, you might do better on Silver Singles.
translation.es: Quizás le iría mejor en una red de citas para mayores.

translation.en: On there, you're like a seven, minimum!
Principal Dana, we don't need an adult, especially not her!
translation.es: Directora Dana, no necesitamos un adulto, ¡y menos a ella!

translation.en: I have tons of wilderness experience, so I should be the leader.
translation.es: Tengo mucha experiencia en aventura, debería ser la líder.

translation.en: And I should be in Paris.
translation.es: Y yo debería estar en París.

translation.en: I'm missing Fashion Week, and it's missing moi.
translation.es: Me pierdo de la Semana de la Moda y ellos se pierden de mí.

translation.en: Okay, I feel for you both
translation.es: Lo siento. Por ambas. Siempre que los analgésicos me lo permitan,

translation.en: as much as my pain medication will let me, but...
translation.es: Lo siento. Por ambas. Siempre que los analgésicos me lo permitan, pero la jueza me envió a Kaylie, yo la envié al grupo y punto final.

translation.en: the judge sent Kaylie to me, I sent her to you, and that's that.
translation.es: pero la jueza me envió a Kaylie, yo la envié al grupo y punto final.

translation.en: Did that sound commanding? I've been practicing in front of my cats.
translation.es: ¿Sonó autoritario? Estuve practicando con mis gatos.

translation.en: -[both] But-- -All right, fine. You win.
All right, Amber, you can lead a bunch of teenagers into the woods unsupervised,
translation.es: Amber, lleva al bosque a un grupo de adolescentes sin supervisión,

translation.en: -and Kaylie you can go to Paris. -[both] Really?
translation.es: - y, Kaylie, vete a París. - ¿De veras?

translation.en: No!
Apparently, I need to work on my sarcasm in front of my cats too.
translation.es: Necesito practicar el sarcasmo frente a mis gatos.

translation.en: Principal Dana, even if we do need an adult,
translation.es: Directora Dana, aunque necesitemos un adulto,

translation.en: do you really think Kaylie Konrad is the best choice?
translation.es: ¿en serio cree que Kaylie Konrad es la mejor opción?

translation.en: This is the girl that cried on her reality show when her car got bird poop on it.
translation.es: La chica que lloró en su reality cuando un ave hizo caca en su auto.

translation.en: [crying] No! No!
Not my car!
Okay, to be fair, that bird had some serious stomach issues.
translation.es: Oigan, esa ave tenía graves problemas estomacales.

translation.en: You look stupid.
All I'm saying is I wanna beat the Lumberjacks this year,
translation.es: Realmente quiero vencer a los Leñadores este año,

translation.en: which is going to be really tough, and Kaylie Konrad could never handle that.
translation.es: lo cual será muy difícil. Y Kaylie Konrad no podrá manejarlo.

translation.en: [Kit] Kaylie could never handle that.
Wait. You don't think I can do it? Nobody does!
translation.es: - Espera. ¿No crees que pueda hacerlo? - ¡Nadie lo cree!

translation.en: I mean, if you last longer than a week, I owe the judge a dinner at Sizzler.
translation.es: Si duras más de una semana, invito a cenar a la jueza.

translation.en: Well, you're wrong, and I'll prove it.
Ooh, can you prove it somewhere else? I just got a message from OkCupid.
translation.es: ¿Puedes probarlo en otro lado? Recibí un mensaje de OkCupid.

translation.en: Oh! [giggles]
Apparently, a Nigerian prince wants to meet me.
translation.es: Parece que un príncipe nigeriano quiere conocerme.

translation.en: This could be my last chance at happiness.
translation.es: Puede ser mi última oportunidad de ser feliz.

translation.en: Okay, now I just need to send him my bank account information.
translation.es: Solo necesito enviarle la información de mi cuenta bancaria.

translation.en: -But Principal Dana-- -Ah.
It's Princess Dana to you.
Off you go.
Greetings,
my Nigerian subjects.
Remember, everything the light touches is mine.
translation.es: Recuerden, todo lo que baña la luz es mi reino.

translation.en: All right, kids, to the wilderness!
-The door is that way. -The door is that way!
translation.es: - La puerta está allá. - La puerta está allá.

translation.en: Wait for Ray Ray!
Had to get my wilderness look on point.
I thought dirt wasn't your color? Turns out, I go with everything.
translation.es: - Pensé que no te gustaba la tierra. - Resulta que todo me queda bien.

translation.en: So can I go with you? Please, please, please!
Okay, just no more touching my hair.
translation.es: Sí, pero no me toques el cabello.

translation.en: I promise. Cross my heart and hope to die young and pretty.
translation.es: Lo juro. Que me parta un rayo y espero morir joven y bonito.

translation.en: Okay. Let's see here.
Uh, Miss Konrad, that's a star map of celebrity homes.
translation.es: Señorita Konrad, ese es un mapa de casas de famosos.

translation.en: Oh, I know.
I just wanted to show you that my house is bigger than Gigi Hadid's. Yay!
translation.es: Quería mostrarles que mi casa es más grande que la de Gigi Hadid. ¡Sí!

translation.en: Yay!
I know which way to go.
We head north to get to Sunset Peak where we plant our flag,
translation.es: Iremos hacia al norte para llegar a la Cima Sunset y poner nuestra bandera.

translation.en: which is... this way.
translation.es: Iremos hacia al norte para llegar a la Cima Sunset y poner nuestra bandera. - Es por aquí. - Ay.

translation.en: Aw! Is that a picture of you and your mom?
translation.es: - Es por aquí. - Ay. ¿Es una foto tuya y de tu mamá?

translation.en: That's so sweet.
She doesn't look like she's judging you.
We have to hurry.
-Wait. I don't have a signal. -Kaylie needs a signal!
translation.es: - Espera. No tengo señal. - ¡Kaylie necesita señal!

translation.en: Stars, they're just like us.
There's no cell service in the woods.
translation.es: No hay señal en el bosque.

translation.en: [sighs] Fine. I'll use the Wi-Fi. What's the password?
translation.es: Bien. Usaré wifi. ¿Cuál es la contraseña?

translation.en: We're going to die out here.
Is that all lowercase?
[sighs] Let's go! We have to beat the Lumberjacks to the peak!
In your dreams, Porcupukes!
Emphasis on the "poor."
Drop dead, Lumberjerks.
Emphasis on "drop dead."
I curse the Lumberjerks!
I think someone already has. How else can you explain those outfits?
translation.es: Alguien ya lo hecho. Mira esos atuendos.

translation.en: May your blisters get blisters until your shoes are drenched in blood!
translation.es: ¡Que sus ampollas tengan ampollas hasta que sus zapatos se llenen de sangre!

translation.en: Yeah, that happened to me once at a photoshoot for Manolo Blahnik.
translation.es: Eso me pasó en una sesión de fotos para Manolo Blahnik.

translation.en: Twelve straight hours in six-inch stilettos...
translation.es: Doce horas en tacones de 15 centímetros...

translation.en: I still can't get my heels down.
translation.es: Aún no puedo bajar los talones.

translation.en: Kaylie Konrad? What are you doing with these lames?
I'm the leader of the lames! No, she's not.
translation.es: - ¡Soy la líder de los idiotas! - No, no lo es.

translation.en: We're her punishment. She's ours.
translation.es: Somos su castigo. Ella es el nuestro.

translation.en: Who cares? We're gonna beat you like a baby seal!
And win that annual Wilderness Trophy, just like last year.
translation.es: Y ganaremos el trofeo anual Aventura como el año pasado.

translation.en: [man] Afternoon, y'all.
Wow. You're like a real-life pickup truck commercial.
translation.es: Vaya. Eres como un modelo rudo en la vida real.

translation.en: I'm Colt Axelrod, new volunteer leader of the Lumberjacks.
translation.es: Soy Colt Axelrod, nuevo líder voluntario de los Leñadores.

translation.en: Sorry, no autographs. It's not fair to the kids.
translation.es: Nada de autógrafos. No es justo para los demás.

translation.en: Uh, excuse me. Am I supposed to know who you are?
Yes.
This is Kaylie Konrad, as in the Konrad Kronicles,
translation.es: Esta es Kaylie Konrad, de las Krónicas Konrad,

translation.en: biggest reality TV show ever.
translation.es: el mayor reality show de la historia.

translation.en: I don't own a TV.
I'd rather hike, or fish, or read.
Oh, you mean like on a Kindle?
Uh, no, a book. [chuckles] It's like a Kindle...
translation.es: No, en un libro. Es como un Kindle. Pero es un libro.

translation.en: but it's a book.
translation.es: Es como un Kindle. Pero es un libro.

translation.en: I think people spend way too much time on their devices
translation.es: La gente pasa demasiado tiempo en sus dispositivos

translation.en: and all that social media nonsense.
translation.es: y en esa tontería de las redes sociales.

translation.en: [scoffs] Nonsense? That nonsense paid for my private island
translation.es: y en esa tontería de las redes sociales. ¿Tonterías? Esa tontería pagó mi isla privada,

translation.en: where all the money has my face on it.
translation.es: donde el dinero tiene mi cara.

translation.en: Twenty Kaylies buys a lobster dinner.
translation.es: Veinte Kaylies compran una cena con langosta.

translation.en: Well, hey, as I've tried to tell these kids, money can't buy you happiness.
translation.es: Como les digo a estos niños, el dinero no te da felicidad.

translation.en: Well, clearly you've never jet skied off a mega-yacht.
translation.es: Se ve que nunca montaste en moto acuática desde un megayate.

translation.en: No, but I once jumped off a kayak to save a wounded beaver.
translation.es: No, pero una vez salté de un kayak para salvar a un castor herido.

translation.en: I named him Bucky.
Let's go!
Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Hold on.
No way can we compete with them. Did you see their calves?
translation.es: No podemos competir con ellos. ¿Vieron sus pantorrillas?

translation.en: Well, if we can't catch them, might as well just give up and go home.
translation.es: Si no podemos alcanzarlos, rindámonos y regresemos.

translation.en: You had me at "give up."
Don't give up. May the best team win.
translation.es: No se rindan. Que gane el mejor equipo.

translation.en: We Porcupines do not give up!
We're proud, prickly, and persistent! Now let's run!
Easy for you to say. Your heels still touch the ground.
translation.es: Es fácil para ti decirlo. Tus talones tocan el suelo.

translation.en: Why don't we just take that shortcut?
I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.es: No creo que sea buena idea.

translation.en: Yeah, we're supposed to stick to the trail.
[scoffs] Says who?
Literally everyone.
Okay, are you gonna listen to a bunch of signs
translation.es: ¿Van a seguir un montón de señales que se pusieron aquí

translation.en: that were placed here with a lot of careful thought and planning,
translation.es: ¿Van a seguir un montón de señales que se pusieron aquí con mucho cuidado y planificación o me van a escuchar?

translation.en: or are you gonna listen to me?
translation.es: con mucho cuidado y planificación o me van a escuchar?

translation.en: And before you answer, may I remind you that I won a People's Choice Award.
translation.es: Y antes de contestar, les recuerdo que gané un premio People's Choice.

translation.en: It's your only shot at winning. No offense to your cool blister curse.
translation.es: Es su única oportunidad de ganar. Sin desmerecer la maldición de las ampollas.

translation.en: None taken.
BTW, have you noticed any warts popping up on you?
Ew, no.
Why?
No reason.
Well, since we'll never catch them on the trail,
translation.es: Como nunca los alcanzaremos por el sendero,

translation.en: I guess we have to try it your way.
Yay, I'm a leader! Follow me!
I knew I'd be walking through dirt.
translation.es: Sabía que andaría por la tierra.

translation.en: Didn't know I'd be eating it.
Watch your step. It's slippery.
We're not gonna make it! Kaylie, can I please be buried with you?
translation.es: ¡No lo lograremos! Kaylie, ¿me pueden enterrar contigo?

translation.en: No, because when I die, my mom wants me cremated
translation.es: No, porque cuando muera, mi mamá me cremará y así usará mis cenizas

translation.en: so she can use my ashes
translation.es: mi mamá me cremará y así usará mis cenizas

translation.en: to sell limited edition genuine platinum-plated necklaces.
translation.es: para vender collares platinados de edición limitada.

translation.en: Whoa! That's cold.
No, it's not! She promised to give me half the profits.
translation.es: ¡No! Prometió darme la mitad de las ganancias.

translation.en: But... you'll be dead.
Oh.
Then I want 100% of the profits!
That'll show her.
Lord, when I said, "Cross my heart and hope to die young and pretty,"
translation.es: Señor, cuando recé para morir joven y bonito,

translation.en: I did not mean today!
No one is going to die-- [screams]
Amber, don't fall! I got us a Groupon for a couple's massage.
translation.es: ¡Amber, no te caigas! ¡Tengo un cupón para masajes de pareja!

translation.en: I'd rather plummet to my death.
[screams] I'm slipping! Hold on!
[grunts] Kaylie!
I'll get you.
Ah! I see a foothold. That's more like a toehold!
translation.es: - Veo un punto de apoyo. - ¡Solo cabe tu dedo!

translation.en: That's all I need. Thank you, Manolo Blahnik!
Amber, grab my hand.
-I can't. I'll fall! -[Kaylie] No, you won't!
translation.es: - No puedo, me caeré. - ¡Claro que no!

translation.en: There's a toehold near your right foot. Feel for it,
translation.es: Hay un punto de apoyo cerca de tu pie derecho. Búscalo, y cuando estés lista, dame la mano y te levantaré.

translation.en: and when you're ready, give me your hand, and I'll pull you up.
translation.es: Búscalo, y cuando estés lista, dame la mano y te levantaré.

translation.en: I can't find it!
[Kaylie] Okay, just a little to your right.
Yes, right there! Come on. [grunts]
Are you okay?
Yeah. I just can't stop thinking
translation.es: Sí. No puedo dejar de pensar en un masaje de parejas con Chewy.

translation.en: about getting a couple's massage with Chewy.
translation.es: No puedo dejar de pensar en un masaje de parejas con Chewy.

translation.en: Look, we're almost on solid ground! Let's go.
Careful. Yeah.
Okay. Everybody, grab on to this scarf.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Todos, agarren esta bufanda.

translation.en: But it's my mom's, so don't drop it, or she'll fire me.
translation.es: Pero es de mi mamá. Si la dejen caer, me despedirá.

translation.en: From the show? From the family.
Okay, so we've got to keep going, or we'll never catch the Lumberjacks.
translation.es: Debemos continuar o nunca alcanzaremos a los Leñadores.

translation.en: Which way do we go?
My compass, it's gone.
Oh, no! It must have fallen out of your pocket when you fell.
translation.es: ¡No! Quizá se cayó de tu bolsillo cuando te caíste.

translation.en: So let's recap.
Your shortcut got us lost, which made me lose my compass.
translation.es: Tu atajo nos hizo perdernos, lo que me hizo perder la brújula.

translation.en: So now we're going to lose to the Lumberjacks again!
And it's all your fault!
Amber, wait!
What's the matter with her?
She's upset because that was her mom's compass.
translation.es: Está molesta porque era la brújula de su mamá.

translation.en: They always used it when they went camping.
But then her mom died last year.
translation.es: Su mamá murió el año pasado.

translation.en: They were super close, and it's been really hard on her.
translation.es: Eran muy unidas y ha sido difícil para ella.

translation.en: Oh, no.
Poor Amber. No wonder she's so upset.
translation.es: Pobre Amber. Con razón está molesta.

translation.en: You guys wait here.
I should go too.
My shawty needs some sweet X's and O's from her love thug Chewy.
translation.es: Mi adorada necesita besos y abrazos de su amado incondicional, Chewy.

translation.en: Hasn't she suffered enough?
That seat's taken.
Weird. When I made the reservation,
translation.es: Qué raro. Cuando hice la reserva, solicité específicamente

translation.en: I specifically requested this uncomfortable spot on the ground.
translation.es: Cuando hice la reserva, solicité específicamente este lugar incómodo en el suelo.

translation.en: [laughs] Just kidding.
I'm a celebrity. I don't need reservations.
Amber, I am so incredibly sorry about your mom's compass.
translation.es: Amber, lamento mucho lo de la brújula de tu mamá.

translation.en: Hey.
You know what's weird?
This is the first time I haven't been able to hear the freeway in a long time.
translation.es: Es la primera vez que no oigo la autopista en mucho tiempo.

translation.en: It's kind of nice.
Peaceful.
Don't you think?
I guess.
Until a bear comes along. Good thing I can run faster than you.
translation.es: Hasta que aparezca un oso. Qué bueno que puedo correr más rápido que tú.

translation.en: That's what you think. I've been outrunning the paparazzi since I was two,
translation.es: Eso crees. Me escapo de los paparazzi desde los dos años,

translation.en: which is not easy in bedazzled booties.
translation.es: y no era fácil con botitas.

translation.en: You know,
when my mom and I went camping,
this is how we chose our spot.
When we couldn't hear the cars anymore.
translation.es: Cuando ya no podíamos oír los autos.

translation.en: I get that.
And...
now I get why you like being out in nature so much.
translation.es: ...ahora entiendo por qué te gusta tanto la naturaleza.

translation.en: It's because of your mom, right?
You know what's dumb?
It's not like it's gonna bring her back.
translation.es: No es que me la vaya a devolver.

translation.en: No, but...
remembering the things that you guys shared,
it helps keep her here.
And I think she's still here.
She would be so proud of you.
I don't know why.
Are you kidding?
Look at all the stuff you know! How to read a trail,
translation.es: ¡Mira todo lo que sabes! Cómo entender un sendero,

translation.en: the fact the wilderness cruelly prevents cell phone service.
translation.es: cómo la naturaleza prohíbe el servicio celular.

translation.en: Are you absolutely sure about that one?
I'm sure.
Plus, you never give up.
translation.es: Además, nunca te das por vencida.

translation.en: And you're a great leader.
I just got us lost and put all you kids in danger.
translation.es: Yo solo logré que nos perdiéramos y los puse en peligro.

translation.en: Another Kaylie catastrophe, as my mom would say.
translation.es: Otra catástrofe Kaylie, como diría mi mamá.

translation.en: What?
Your mom must be super proud of you.
translation.es: Tu madre debe estar muy orgullosa de ti.

translation.en: Nope. Actually, she just thinks I'm a mess and can't handle anything.
translation.es: No. De hecho, cree que soy un desastre y no sé hacer nada.

translation.en: You are not a mess, and you sure handled everything back on that cliff.
translation.es: No eres un desastre, supiste manejarte bien en el acantilado.

translation.en: Listen, you stayed calm,
and you saved my life.
Thanks for that, by the way.
You're welcome.
So, you mean my mom might actually be... wrong?
translation.es: Entonces... ...¿crees que mi mamá puede estar equivocada?

translation.en: Maybe I can handle stuff?
-I do. -[sighs]
And I think the Porcupines could use an adult leader after all.
translation.es: Y creo que los Puercoespines podrían tener un líder adulto.

translation.en: Well, co-leader.
Okay, something just messed with my hair, and I don't think it was Ray Ray!
translation.es: Algo me arruinó el cabello y no creo que haya sido Ray Ray.

translation.en: Oh...
I think that's bird poop.
Oh.
Okay.
Kaylie!
A bird just pooped on your head, and you didn't freak out!
translation.es: ¡Un pájaro se hizo caca en ti y no enloqueciste!

translation.en: -Told you you can handle anything. -[chuckles]
translation.es: Te dije que puedes manejar lo que sea.

translation.en: Well if that's the case, what are we doing just sitting here?
-We should go beat those Lumberjerks! -Yeah!
Oh, but don't you want me to wipe that poop out of your hair first?
translation.es: Pero ¿no quieres que te limpie el cabello?

translation.en: Yeah, but with what?
How about your mom's scarf?
Think I can handle that.
Okay.
Thanks, Amber. Let's go.
-The trail is that way! -The trail is that way!
translation.es: - El sendero está allá. - El sendero está allá.

translation.en: Finally!
I was starting to get worry wrinkles.
Hey, guys. What'd we miss? Well, Chewy and Valeria are currently trying to trip a caterpillar,
translation.es: - Hola, chicos. ¿Qué nos perdimos? - Chewy y Valeria quieren cazar una oruga,

translation.en: so I'm going to go with nothing.
Are you okay?
Yeah, but I'd be better if we knew which way to go.
translation.es: Sí, pero estaría mejor si supiéramos por dónde ir.

translation.en: We'll never get off this mountain.
On the bright side, Kaylie Konrad's final selfie will be with me!
translation.es: Lo bueno es que la última selfi de Kaylie Konrad será conmigo.

translation.en: The whole world will mourn Kaylie and Ray Ray.
translation.es: Todo el mundo llorará a Kaylie y a Ray Ray.

translation.en: Uh, well, Kaylie anyway.
Aw, Valeria.
So, you like me now?
Duh. Otherwise, you'd have a giant curly hair growing out of your cheek.
translation.es: Claro. Si no, tendrías un pelo rizado saliendo de tu mejilla.

translation.en: Okay, you always want the sun in front of you for the best lighting. Don't squint.
translation.es: Bueno, siempre ponte frente al sol para la mejor luz. No entornes los ojos.

translation.en: -Kaylie, that's it! -I know! That's like Selfie 101.
translation.es: - ¡Kaylie, muy bien! - ¡Lo sé! Es lo básico de una selfi.

translation.en: No, I mean the sun is in front of us, and it sets in the west, right?
translation.es: No, el sol está frente a nosotros y se pone al oeste, ¿no?

translation.en: So that way is west!
Right! And if Dudley is driving me west on Wilshire,
translation.es: ¡Sí! Y si Dudley me lleva al oeste por Wilshire, giramos a la derecha

translation.en: then we turn right to go to Burke Williams!
translation.es: ¡Sí! Y si Dudley me lleva al oeste por Wilshire, giramos a la derecha para ir a Burke Williams.

translation.en: That's where I got our Groupon!
translation.es: Ahí es donde conseguí nuestro cupón.

translation.en: So north must be that way!
translation.es: Así que el norte debe ser allá.

translation.en: Which means we need to go that way to get to Sunset Peak!
translation.es: ¡Significa que debemos ir por allí a la Cima Sunset!

translation.en: Which is right here!
That's not Sunset Peak. That's Selena Gomez's house.
translation.es: Esa no es la Cima Sunset, es la casa de Selena Gomez.

translation.en: Oh, right.
Which is also smaller than my house. Yay! Again!
translation.es: Que también es más pequeña que mi casa. ¡Sí! ¡De nuevo!

translation.en: I... hate... hiking.
On the bright side, my calves are going to look amazing.
translation.es: Lo bueno es que mis pantorrillas se verán increíbles.

translation.en: I could have flown to the peak by now.
translation.es: Pude haber volado a la cima.

translation.en: But, "No," you said. "Leave your broom at home," you said.
translation.es: Pero dijiste: "No, deja la escoba en casa".

translation.en: We're almost at the top! I hope we beat the Lumberjacks!
translation.es: Ya casi llegamos. ¡Ojalá venzamos a los Leñadores!

translation.en: Hey, Porcupoops!
So what took you so long?
I was visiting your mom in prison.
translation.es: Fui a visitar a tu mamá en prisión.

translation.en: She was framed!
That was mean.
I am so sorry. I had no idea she was really in prison.
translation.es: Lo siento mucho. No sabía que estaba en prisión.

translation.en: She's not. Psych!
-[all laugh] -Got 'em.
You're so funny.
Hey, you made it. Great job.
That was a tough hike. All the other teams gave up.
translation.es: Fue una caminata difícil. Los otros equipos se rindieron.

translation.en: Well, not us.
Right. 'Cause when the going gets tough... I call my publicist!
translation.es: - Sí. Cuando todo se pone difícil... - ...¡llamo a mi publicista!

translation.en: Therapist?
Life coach?
Can someone give me a hint?
Yeah, dump these chumps. They are not on your level.
translation.es: Sí, deja a esos tontos. No están a tu nivel.

translation.en: Why are they walking like my nana when her bunions act up?
translation.es: ¿Por qué caminan como mi abuela que tiene juanetes?

translation.en: Oh, they all got these wicked blisters. Like, out of nowhere.
translation.es: A todos le aparecieron ampollas. De la nada.

translation.en: Way to go, Valeria.
Remind me never to cross you.
The blisters are just the beginning. Wait 'til they go home and try to pee.
translation.es: Las ampollas son solo el inicio. Espera a que intenten orinar en casa.

translation.en: Hey, Kaylie, you thirsty?
You wish.
Sure.
Thanks.
Well, we should probably head back down before we lose the light.
We'll be right behind you.
I'm sick of being behind them.
translation.es: Estoy cansada de ir detrás de ellos.

translation.en: I don't mind the view.
We'll get 'em next time.
translation.es: Les ganaremos la próxima vez. Tenemos un año

translation.en: We have a whole year to win that Wilderness Trophy.
translation.es: Les ganaremos la próxima vez. Tenemos un año - para ganar el trofeo Aventura. - Claro.

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.es: - para ganar el trofeo Aventura. - Claro.

translation.en: And now that we're a team, there's nothing we can't do.
translation.es: Ahora que somos un equipo, no hay nada que no podamos hacer.

translation.en: No challenge we can't face together.
translation.es: Ningún reto que no podamos enfrentar juntos.

translation.en: Yeah!
You know what? You're right. But first, we have to get back down the mountain.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Pero primero debemos bajar la montaña.

translation.en: Right. Okay, so where's the escalator?
It's right over there next to the gift shop.
translation.es: Está allí, junto a la tienda de regalos.

translation.en: Ooh, shopping!
I hope they take Kaylies!
